name: Saint Nuno University (Foundation)
description:
Following the Neo-Alexandrian thoughts on education and information, the Saint Nuno University consists of 
a project thriving to gather and compile a vast base of free knowledge and open education materials, making 
it available and accessible widely and around the world.

    The Saint Nuno University is a Private Interest Foundation with its headquarters in Panama City. It consists
of a non-profit institution with the main purpose of providing high-level education.

    The system adopted by the Saint Nuno University is the one of  the Open Course Ware  making 
online materials available for study via the Internet and organized by online courses through a model of an 
Open University.
